paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: Women diagnosed with breast cancer at age ≤30 years

functional_data.summary: The mutation was identified in a family fulfilling LFS criteria.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was part of the additional samples obtained since the last report.
key_quotes: The updated analysis demonstrated an additional TP53 mutation: 659A>G in a family fulfilling LFS criteria, four further BRCA1 mutations... and 1 BRCA2 mutation (1058C>A) out of the 15 additional samples obtained since our last report.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported in the paper.
